english.segment1: who was I fooling?. I still had your name burned in my heart. when my lips where lying. you still seemed to know my every thought. every nightfall's like a reflection. of the debt of love I owe to you. every morning rings like a phone call. saying "when will you be home?"
english.segment2: CHORUS. I see your arms stretched wide. I think I'll lay my burdens here. I could just fall forever. I could just fall forever here
english.segment3: shame overwhelms me. every trial I put you through. how could I take back. all the insults hurled at you?. every night you call went unanswered. every day I heard and ran
english.segment4: CHORUS. I see your arms stretched wide. longing to hold this broken child. I could just fall forever. I could just fall forever here
